translations.translation: Then its explanation is Our concern.
The exposition of its meaning surely rests on Us.
then it will be for Us to explain it.
We shall be responsible for its explanation.
Then indeed, to explain its details to you is upon Us.
Then it is for Us to make it clear.
Again on Us (devolves) the explaining of it.
Then Ours it is to explain it.
Then lo! upon Us (resteth) the explanation thereof.
and then, it will be for Us to make its meaning clear.
And thereafter verily upon us is is the expounding thereof.
Then, its exposition [also] lies with Us.
Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
Then it is for Us (Allah) to make it clear to you,
Then upon Us is its explanation.
Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

[75:19] Then, it is for Us to explain it, by making you comprehend [it]: the connection between this verse and what preceded [it] is that those [verses before] imply turning away from God’s signs, whereas this one implies applying oneself to them by memorising them.
(Then lo! upon Us (resteth) the explanation thereof) the explanation of the lawful and unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ } تتبع تلاوته وتكرر حتى ينتقش في صحيفة خاطرك، ويترسَّخ في ذهنك، ثمَّ أجر على لسانك مراراً كذلك، ثمَّ إن بقي لك شك وتردد في معناه { إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ } [القيامة: 19] أي: تبيينه وتوضحه لك، وإزالة ترددك إشكالك عنه
